mapper.sql: n_id, n_name, n_author, n_type, n_words, n_intro, n_chapter, create_time, update_time, n_test01, n_test02, n_test03
mapper.update: update novels set n_name = #{nName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_author = #{nAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_type = #{nType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_words = #{nWords,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_intro = #{nIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_chapter = #{nChapter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, n_test01 = #{nTest01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_test02 = #{nTest02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, n_test03 = #{nTest03,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where n_id = #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
